titles.title: CB 20 For His Name is Exalted

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
FOR HIS NAME IS EXALTED.
His glory above heaven and earth. Holy is the
Lord God Almighty, who was and who is and who
is to come.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
For His name is exalted, His glory above heaven
and earth. Holy is the Lord God Almighty, who
sitteth on the throne and who lives forevermore.
